page.title: 10A DAY IN SELSEY - 21.O6.85.
page.content: On June 21st.1985 we asked people in Selsey to write about their day.We discovered that most people got up between 7.30 and 8.00 and left for work or school between 8.00 and 9.00.They ate their lunches between 1.00 and 1.30 mostly and tea at either 5.15 or 6.30.Most people ate supper between 8.00 and 8.30 and usually sat in front of the television.Few children or adults went to bed before 10.00. For breakfast people ate cereals, especially muesli or cornflakes, bread sometimes toasted or fried,croissants, marmalade,eggs,bacon and drank tea,coffee or fresh fruit juices. For lunch many people ate sandwiches,crisps and fresh fruit or meat,fish salad,other vegetables.Most drank coffee,fresh fruit juice or water,a few drank wine.
